title: Wisdom of the Forest: Metaphorical Exploration from Human-Centered Work and Learning Perspectives

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in professional fields (medical/legal/technical) and basic science knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners access mobile-based content via smartphones, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments. They are interested in exploring human-centered approaches in professional fields.

learning_goals: Learners can design collaboration strategies by applying the principle of interdependence in forest ecosystems to the work environment.
Learners can reflect on sustainability and accountability in work and learning processes using metaphorical thinking tools.
Learners can develop personal development plans that incorporate a human-centered approach in professional domains.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
